mapper.select: { call USP_RCV_ARTICLE_BASIC_INS( #{curArticle.iud, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curArticle.id, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{sourceCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curArticle.mediaCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curArticle.title, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curArticle.subTitle, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, '', /* Depart */ #{curArticle.pressDateTime, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, '', /* Embargo */ #{curArticle.myun, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curArticle.pan, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, '', /* Urgency */ '', /* Area */ '', /* PressArtType */ #{curArticle.content, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, '', /* Section */ #{curArticle.copyright, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curArticle.serviceUrl, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, '', /* UsedYN */ #{editYn, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, '' /* PhotoYN */ ) }

{ call USP_RCV_ARTICLE_COMPONENT_INS( #{rid, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=int}, #{curArticle.id, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{sourceCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curComponent.url, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curComponent.width, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curComponent.height, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curComponent.desc, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curComponent.etc, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curComponent.etc, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{curComponent.type, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string} ) }
